meanings.definition: A person who engages in networking.
meanings.sent1: The networkers at the event exchanged business cards.
meanings.sent2: I met many networkers at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The networkers decided to have a networking party.
meanings.sent4: She was a master networker, connecting people effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The group of networkers formed a strong bond through networking activities.

meanings.sent1: Networking is essential for career growth.
meanings.sent2: She excels in the art of networking.
meanings.sent3: The networking event turned into a fun social gathering.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, networking is like planting seeds for success.
meanings.sent5: The power of networking lies in building meaningful connections.
